decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (Site location plan, existing block plan, proposed block plan, 1384-cv-01, 02, 03, 04, 05, 06, 2235-02c, 03c, 08, 09, 10, 11 received 17/06/2014) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those shown on the approved drawings and statements.

Condition : 4 - Notwithstanding the General Permitted Development Order 1995 and any subsequent amendments to the Order, the building hereby approved shall not be used for any use other than those covered by use class B1 of the Use Classes Order 1987 (as amended) and any subsequent amendments.

Condition : 5 - Before the development hereby permitted commences the applicant must either:
a.	Investigate the site for landfill gas to the satisfaction of the LPA, to ascertain whether gas protection measures are required.  Where measures are required the details shall be submitted to, and approved by, the LPA.
Or;
b.	The applicant shall install gas protection measures as a precautionary measure without first investigating the site.  The details of these measures shall be submitted to, and approved by, the LPA.
c.	For a. and b. all required measures shall be installed before the development is first occupied.
description: Erection of a two-storey infill extension
